posts.message: في شركة بتفكر تنزل بمشروع جديد وهو تاجير عجل كده من الموبايل زي اوبر .. وعايزة تعرف رايكوا .. يعني هيوزعوا عجل في مواقف كده وانت تاجرها بالساعه او باليوم من الموبايل وترجعها بعد كده لموقف تاني وهكذا ...

We all saw people sharing there WhatsApp public key on the internet and people started to wonder if this is safe.

Well, it is totally safe to share your public key, this is how Public Key Encryption works. Your public key is shared to the world and your private key must be kept in the safest place. 

A lot of technologies depend on Public Key Encryption. For example, the https certificates. In your browser you will find several certificates for major companies. Actually these certificates are the public keys. In fact the public key of google and facebook exists in all the browsers in the world, while the private key is the most top secret in these companies. They even have special hardware equipment to store it.

It takes sometime to understand how it works but it is essential for any programmer to understand this concept. I suggest watching the following list of videos from khan academy, it clearly describes this way of encryption in simple and interesting way
posts.caption: khanacademy.org
posts.description: Why do we need public key cryptography?
